SEARCH
Package org.example.DataAccess

Class AbstractDAO<T>

java.lang.Object
org.example.DataAccess.AbstractDAO<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the entity being handled by the DAO
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientDAO, OrderDAO, ProductDAO
public class AbstractDAO<T> extends Object
The AbstractDAO class provides a generic implementation for database operations using JDBC.
